title: i have got nothing from ocean week
body: i have got all champions and contributed 30+ points during ocean week. all my friends have got a champion. i have got all champions so i should get a skin. but i have got nothing., Riot  please explain.

replies.body:
You should have the icon by now, but I don't believe they've finished rolling out the mystery champs yet, see here:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/LryNggNH-ocean-week-mystery-champion-update

In your case it's a skin, which likely means you will be one of the last batches to get your reward. AFAIK they are doing the skins last so you may be waiting a little longer.
yeah i have got the icon. thanks. i will be waiting for it :)
come on dude if you have all the champs you should be old enough to not be whining about free stuff from riot....
how does one see how many points one contributed?
If the ocean week hub is still up you can see in there, otherwise I don't think there is a way (unless you really want to send in a ticket about it I suppose).
says on that page it is tracked in the client. Is it still active?
It's not unfortunately I looked sometime after I posted. The client tracker was what I meant. If you really want to know you'll have to put in a ticket.
Looking at the champ roster for points I might have got like 3

I see from your post below you have the icon, that's good!

The mystery champion distribution is still going. It's given out in batches and should complete by the end of the week. So don't worry if you earned 4 points or more you will get yours :)

Be patient, I have all the camps too and still waiting.

There are like thousands of players, each got to roll a dice on what they get.

Heres hoping we get something good tho XD
yeah, hopefully not an Ashe skin again. i have got 2 mystery gifts as Ashe skin so far.  lol
lol that sucks XD, too bad you cant refund/sell skins back to riot for RP, or even swap skins worth the same price.

i also got many mystery skins like 4 nidalees, 4 ahri, 3 tristana, 3 graves, 3 ashe balabala...    actually i don't really expect a good skin, just like a surprise lol.  

if i can swap skins, i would have heaps to swap lol

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=RuaQmlX6,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-02-04T04:06:17.242+0000)
>
>  swap skins worth the same price.

That would be the coolest thing ever.
